dempred.classifier

Class AbstractKernelClassifier<T extends Datapoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.classifier.AbstractKernelClassifier<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassifierInterface<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RidgeRegressionDual, WrapperDual

    public abstract class AbstractKernelClassifier<T extends Datapoint>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassifierInterface<T>, java.io.Serializable
    This is an abstract class of a kernel learner...
